dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, USAID, right? They're, like, totally shutting down all their programs in Kazakhstan. Like, everything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, U S A I D, right? They're, like, totally shutting down all their programs in Kazakhstan. Like, everything.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Zhumangarin said that Kazakhstan will conduct a detailed analysis of the organization's work in the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, actually, no. That's, um, not exactly what's happening.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, actually, no. That's, um, not exactly what's happening.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Zhumangarin said that Kazakhstan will conduct a detailed analysis of the organization's work in the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? What, they're just, like, half shutting down? Who cares?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? What, they're just, like, half shutting down? Who cares?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's bigger than that. Kazakhstan is actually launching this huge, uh, detailed analysis of their work.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's bigger than that. Kazakhstan is actually launching this huge, uh, detailed analysis of their work.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Zhumangarin said that Kazakhstan will conduct a detailed analysis of the organization's work in the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. Another, like, government report. Riveting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. Another, like, government report. Riveting.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But this isn't just paperwork. They're looking into, uh, financial flows, possible cover-up schemes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But this isn't just paperwork. They're looking into, uh, financial flows, possible cover-up schemes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, an analysis of financial flows is necessary to identify possible cover-up schemes, inconsistencies in the use of funds, and conflicts of interest," the document notes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Cover-up schemes? Seriously? What, like, for, I don't know, a new customs server?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Cover-up schemes? Seriously? What, like, for, I don't know, a new customs server?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah, they did get, uh, server equipment. But they're also talking about "harmful sponsorship projects" for children.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah, they did get, uh, server equipment. But they're also talking about harmful sponsorship projects for children.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As part of the USAID Central Asia Trade Program, the State Revenue Committee received 12 units of server equipment worth 385.8 million tenge. ... Regarding the development of a bill that would provide for the protection and psycho-emotional, mental, and physical safety of our children from such harmful "sponsorship" projects: the Ministry of Justice has currently sent a corresponding request to government agencies to work on this issue," the response says.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Kids? That's a bit... dramatic, isn't it? What's that even mean?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kids? That's a bit... dramatic, isn't it? What's that even mean?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I guess they're worried about the impact of some projects. And, uh, the US themselves canceled 83% of their own USAID programs globally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I guess they're worried about the impact of some projects. And, uh, the U S themselves canceled eighty three percent of their own U S A I D programs globally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By the way, the United States has officially canceled 83% of USAID programs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, they canceled them? Not Kazakhstan?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, they canceled them? Not Kazakhstan?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By the way, the United States has officially canceled 83% of USAID programs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Marco Rubio said those programs, uh, "did not serve, and in some cases harmed, the core national interests of the United States."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Marco Rubio said those programs, uh, did not serve, and in some cases harmed, the core national interests of the United States.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Secretary of State Marco Rubio reported that the 200 contracts that were canceled "spent tens of billions of dollars in ways that did not serve, and in some cases harmed, the core national interests of the United States."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, what, the US thinks their own aid was, like, bad for them? And now Kazakhstan is doing the same thing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, what, the U S thinks their own aid was, like, bad for them? And now Kazakhstan is doing the same thing?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Secretary of State Marco Rubio reported that the 200 contracts that were canceled "spent tens of billions of dollars in ways that did not serve, and in some cases harmed, the core national interests of the United States."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. It implies there's, like, a real reason to scrutinize this stuff, you know? It's not just, um, bureaucracy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. It implies there's, like, a real reason to scrutinize this stuff, you know? It's not just, um, bureaucracy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Mmm. Or maybe it's all just bureaucracy. I don't know.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mmm. Or maybe it's all just bureaucracy. I don't know.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but the money, Host_A! Twenty-six point five million dollars allocated. For things like, uh, civil society and media.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but the money, Host_A! Twenty-six point five million dollars allocated. For things like, uh, civil society and media.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As stated in the response to the deputy's request, in 2023-2024, USAID allocated $26.5 million in various areas, including the economy, energy, healthcare, civil society and media.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And, what, Kazakhstan thinks it's being, like, misspent? Or worse?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, what, Kazakhstan thinks it's being, like, misspent? Or worse?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, an analysis of financial flows is necessary to identify possible cover-up schemes, inconsistencies in the use of funds, and conflicts of interest," the document notes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they're looking for inconsistencies. And they've already, uh, caught five violations of reporting rules this year alone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, they're looking for inconsistencies. And they've already, uh, caught five violations of reporting rules this year alone.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2024, five violations were registered under the relevant article 460-1 of the Code of Administrative Offenses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Five violations. That's... a number, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Five violations. That's... a number, I guess.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It shows they're serious, though, doesn't it? This isn't just, uh, for show.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It shows they're serious, though, doesn't it? This isn't just, uh, for show.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: We'll see if anything actually, like, happens.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: We'll see if anything actually, like, happens.
